DOC.brief_summary: The investigators study the efficacy of epidural sufentanil/ropivacaine for analgesia labor in primiparas so as to decrease perinatal complications of analgesia labor.
DOC.detailed_description: A prospective study of 120 full-term parturients receiving labor analgesia were randomly assigned into 2 groups: the 0.5Sufen group (N=60), the 0.25Sufen group (N=60).
DOC.criteria: 1. Patients had regular prenatal examinations at the outpatient clinic; 2. They were between 25 to 35 years of age) 3. They had a gestational age ≥37 weeks and < 42 weeks; 4. They had an estimated fetal weight ≥ 2,500 g and < 4,200 g. a history of spinal surgery, platelet count ＜100×109 /L , coagulation disorder, sensorimotor disorder of lower extremity, leg pain, puncture point infection, heart disease history, pulmonary disease, liver and renal function disorder and a history of neuropsychiatry drugs.
